title: 8lp?
body: * So like, 1 hour game for 8lp? zzzzz{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
nice MMR mate.

I never get anything below 25.
Well Challenger get like 8-12 LP per win and lose 20ish per loss and if they don't have a ranked game within a week they lose 200 points.
Exactly what happened to me, in my previous games I won ~20 lp but now I only got 8 lp ;-;
